question: How many crores order BHEL Bags Order From NTPC?
explanation: Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited (BHEL) bagged an order worth Rs 560 crore from NTPC for setting up a system for emission control. BHEL has secured the order for "supply and installation of the flue gas desulphurisation (FGD) system from NTPC for 2x490 MW National Capital Power Station at Dadri in Uttar Pradesh.
